Module kivakit.core.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.modules

Class Modules

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.modules.Modules
  • public class Modules
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides easy access to module resources. The resource(StringPath), resources(PackagePath), nestedResources(PackagePath) and nestedResources(PackagePath, Matcher) methods find resources and return them as ModuleResource object(s). The search scope is restricted to URIs that match the scope "kivakit" by default. This scope can be expanded with addSearchScope(String).
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
    See Also:
    ModuleResource

        public static java.util.List<ModuleResource> nestedResources​(PackagePath _package)

      • resource

        public static ModuleResource resource​(StringPath path)
        Returns:

      • resources

        public static java.util.List<ModuleResource> resources​(PackagePath _package)
        Returns:
        A list of the ModuleResources in the given package (but not any below it)
